review_blob: a very deep and soulful mahogany color with a savory tight head.  smells natural like rich freshly turned earth.  after plowing through the thick beer cream on top i found a satisfyingly mellow slightly thin body, heavy roasted flavor adds to this beers appeal.  the legs are curvy, they give the drinker something to take to the bathroom and think about.

Too fruity for me, I prefer a bolder hefe-weiss.  Pleasently crisp though and very little to no after taste made this beer drinkable for me.  I would not serve this with anything heavy or seasoned though.
